header.description: We simplify the complex Albania visa process with our proven 4-step approach, ensuring your application meets all Albanian immigration requirements.

consultation.title: Initial consultation and assessment
consultation.description: Our Albania immigration specialists evaluate your eligibility and provide detailed information about Albania residence permit requirements and visa options.

documentPreparation.title: Document preparation and review
documentPreparation.description: We guide you through gathering all required documents, ensuring they meet Albania immigration standards and are properly apostilled and authenticated.

applicationSubmission.title: Application submission and tracking
applicationSubmission.description: Our legal team submits your Albania residence permit application and provides ongoing support throughout the Ministry of Interior processing.

permitApproval.title: Residence permit approval and registration
permitApproval.description: We assist with the final steps including local police registration, biometric enrollment, and ensure you receive your Albania residence permit.
